mapper.insert: insert into exam (exam_id, exam_code, exam_name, exam_type, exam_status, publish_start_time, publish_end_time, score_point, del_flag, exam_explain) values (#{examId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{examCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{examStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{publishStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publishEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scorePoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{examExplain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update exam set exam_code = #{examCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exam_name = #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exam_type = #{examType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, exam_status = #{examStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, publish_start_time = #{publishStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publish_end_time = #{publishEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, score_point = #{scorePoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, exam_explain = #{examExplain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where exam_id = #{examId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select exam_id, exam_code, exam_name, exam_type, exam_status, publish_start_time, publish_end_time, score_point, del_flag, exam_explain from exam where exam_code=#{examCode} and del_flag=#{delFlag}
select exam_id, exam_code, exam_name, exam_type, exam_status, publish_start_time, publish_end_time, score_point, del_flag, exam_explain from exam where exam_id = #{examId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select exam_id, exam_code, exam_name, exam_type, exam_status, publish_start_time, publish_end_time, score_point, del_flag, exam_explain from exam

select exam_id examId, exam_code examCode, exam_name examName, exam_type examType, exam_status examStatus, publish_start_time publishStartTime, publish_end_time publishEndTime, score_point scorePoint, del_flag delFlag, exam_explain examPlain from exam
